sentences.cn: 极为含糊不清的政治辩论

sentences.en: a cloudy night with some light rain
sentences.cn: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.en: Bob always enjoys sailing, even though the weather is cloudy.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃总是很喜欢航行, 即使空中乌云密布.

sentences.en: Cloudy skies grounded planes to Washington.
sentences.cn: 天空多云使飞往华盛顿的飞机停飞.

sentences.en: Cloudy sky drove the bathers off the beach.
sentences.cn: 阴霾的天空把海滩上的游客都赶跑了.

sentences.en: It's so cloudy and cold that it's likely to snow.
sentences.cn: 天气又阴又冷,大半要下雪.

sentences.en: Men are subject to sudden changes of fortune as the moon is subject to the changes of being full and crescent, cloudy and clear.
sentences.cn: 人有旦夕祸福, 月有阴晴圆缺.

sentences.en: Only a tiny patch of blue was visible in the cloudy sky.
sentences.cn: 多云的天空中只见到一小块儿湛蓝.

sentences.en: Outside, it was cloudy and blowing a few flakes of snow.
sentences.cn: 外面是满天阴云,飘着几片雪花.

sentences.en: The legal position is very cloudy.
sentences.cn: 法律对此的态度十分模糊。

sentences.en: The lime water has turned cloudy, therefore carbon dioxide has been produced during the experiment.
sentences.cn: 石灰水变得混浊了, 可见在实验中有二氧化碳生成了.

sentences.en: The prospect for passage of the bill was somewhat cloudy, in view of its evident unconstitutionality.
sentences.cn: 由于这个议案明显地违反了宪法, 它能否得到通过的前景就有点不明显了.

sentences.en: This afternoon will be cloudy, turning clear.
Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.
We observed that it had turned cloudy.
sentences.cn: 我们注意到天已经变阴了.

sentences.en: White always mates, he thought with a sort of cloudy mysticism.
sentences.cn: 白子总将死对方, 他带着一种模模糊糊的神秘感觉这么想.

words.tran_cn: 乌云密布的；有暗影的，阴的
云；阴云；云状物；一大群；黑斑
使混乱；以云遮敝；使忧郁；玷污

trans.tran_en: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds
a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds
